TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class BaseValidator : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label, System.Web.UI.IValidator
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label implements class System.Web.UI.IValidator
Public MustInherit Class BaseValidator Inherits Label Implements IValidator
public ref class BaseValidator abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Label, System::Web::UI::IValidator
type BaseValidator = class inherit Label interface IValidator

summary.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls.

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供之所有驗證控制項的核心實作。The class provides the core implementation for all validation controls. 驗證控制項用來驗證相關聯的輸入控制項中的使用者輸入。Validation controls are used to validate user input in an associated input control. 當使用者輸入驗證失敗的值時，驗證控制項就會顯示錯誤訊息。When the user enters a value that fails validation, the validation control displays an error message. 因為驗證控制項分開的輸入控制項，您可以在相對於輸入控制項的頁面上任何位置放置錯誤訊息。Because a validation control is separated from the input control, you can position the error message anywhere on the page relative to the input control. ASP.NET 提供了數個可執行特定的驗證類型驗證控制項。ASP.NET provides several validation controls that perform specific types of validation. 下表描述這些控制項。The following table describes these controls. |驗證控制項Validation control|描述Description| |------------------------|-----------------| ||設定會針對另一個輸入控制項中輸入的值與常數值，或針對適當的資料類型的值來驗證屬性。Validates a value against the value entered into another input control, against a constant value, or against a proper data type by setting the property to .| ||驗證使用的使用者提供自訂驗證常式的值。Validates a value using a user-provided custom validation routine.| ||驗證值是否可為值的範圍內。Validates whether a value is within a range of values.| ||驗證使用規則運算式的值。Validates a value using a regular expression.| ||驗證必要的欄位中所輸入的值。Validates that a value was entered in a required field.| 驗證控制項一律會驗證伺服器上的相關聯輸入的控制項。Validation controls always validate the associated input control on the server. 驗證控制項也會有完整的用戶端實作，可讓指令碼啟用 （例如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 或更新版本) 的瀏覽器用戶端上執行驗證。Validation controls also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 用戶端驗證，以增強驗證程序傳送到伺服器之前，請檢查使用者輸入。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 這可讓之前提交表單時，避免的伺服器端驗證所需的資訊，來回行程期間偵測到用戶端上的錯誤。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 多個驗證控制項可以搭配個別的輸入控制項，以驗證不同的準則。Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria. 例如，您可以套用多個驗證控制項上控制項。For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a control. 您可以使用控制項中輸入的值時，確保內設定的範圍和控制項，以確保使用者輸入的值。You can use a control to ensure that the value entered in the control is within a set range, and a control to ensure that the user enters a value. ASP.NET 提供許多控制項已張貼至伺服器的能力。ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server. 當其中一種控制項具有其`CausesValidation`屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時執行驗證。When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to the server. 下列控制項有能力回傳至伺服器：The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 其中某些控制項回傳至伺服器時，才`AutoPostBack`屬性設定為`true`。Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`. 這些控制項都具有`ValidationGroup`屬性，設定時，控制觸發程序回傳至伺服器時，驗證只驗證控制項內指定的群組。These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server. 若要驗證控制項組成群組，請設定每個驗證控制項屬性設為相同值。To group validation controls, set the property of each validation control to the same value. 若要將輸入的控制項與驗證控制項產生關聯，請使用屬性。To associate an input control with a validation control, use the property. 若要指定要驗證失敗時，驗證控制項中顯示的文字，請使用屬性。To specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails, use the property. 您也可以顯示在頁面中的驗證失敗所使用的所有控制項的摘要控制項。You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a control. 若要指定要顯示在文字控制，請使用屬性。To specify the text to display in a control, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定屬性未設定屬性、 值屬性也會顯示在驗證控制項。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control. 當使用驗證器控制項時，您應該永遠會檢查之前執行任何處理伺服器端驗證的結果。When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing. 回傳，但之後會呼叫事件方法之前，頁面呼叫驗證程式控制項和彙總至其結果屬性。After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the property. (您也可以呼叫使用明確的驗證程式控制項`Validate`方法。)在您自己的程式碼中，您應該檢查屬性會傳回`true`之前處理輸入。(You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the property returns `true` before processing input. 即使已啟用指令碼的瀏覽器可能會阻止回傳發生在用戶端上，如果驗證檢查失敗，您永遠也應該檢查處理驗證的資料之前的伺服器程式碼中。Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check in server code before processing validated data. 您可以手動執行驗證。You can also manually perform validation. 若要驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上，使用方法。To validate all validation controls on the page, use the method. 可由使用驗證個別驗證控制項控制項的方法。Individual validation controls can be validated by using the method of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用屬性`Page_Load`方法，您必須先明確地呼叫方法。If you use the property in a `Page_Load` method, you must first explicitly call the method. 因為驗證發生之後事件頁面上，但會在事件處理常式之前`Click`或`Command`事件，屬性不會更新直到方法呼叫。Because validation occurs after the event for the page, but before the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` events, the property is not updated until the method is called. 或者，您可以在您的程式碼的事件處理常式`Click`或`Command`事件，而不是`Page_Load`方法。As an alternative, you can place your code in the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` event instead of the `Page_Load` method. 並非所有的 Web 伺服器控制項支援驗證的控制項。Not all Web server controls support validation controls. 標準控制項可驗證與驗證控制項有：The standard controls that can be validated with a validation control are: - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 輸入要驗證控制項的屬性必須套用至控制項。For an input control to be validated, the attribute must be applied to the control. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用驗證器控制項衍生自內控制，請確定驗證程式控制項以及與其相關聯的控制項是在相同的面板。When you use validator controls that derive from inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 如需有關使用控制局部網頁更新，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 當驗證失敗時，您可以藉由設定相關聯輸入控制項上設定焦點屬性`true`。When validation fails, you can set the focus on the associated input control by setting the property to `true`. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用多個驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入有效的值控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use multiple validation controls to verify that the user enters a valid value in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會直接呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor is not called directly. 繼承自這個類別的驗證控制項可以從他們自己的建構函式來初始化基底屬性呼叫這個建構函式。Validation controls that inherit from this class can call this constructor from their own constructors to initialize the base properties. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`true`| ||| ||`true`| ||`false`|

summary.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified object.

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來呈現控制項的 HTML 標記中控制項的屬性。The method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control. 這個方法通常會覆寫由控制項開發人員在衍生類別中插入適當的屬性和樣式以控制項的輸出資料流。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for a control.

span.para: 在覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底類別中的對應方法。否則，將不會轉譯的基底類別中包含的屬性。
When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class. Otherwise, the attributes contained in the base class will not be rendered.

summary.span: Verifies whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties.

span.span: Verifies whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法主要是供方法，以驗證是否已指定的控制項在頁面上，包含驗證屬性。The method is a helper method used primarily by the method to verify whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties. 這個方法不會傳回值來報告結果。This method does not return a value to report the result. 相反地，它會擲回例外狀況時驗證失敗。Instead, it throws an exception when verification fails. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: The specified control is not found.

span.span: The specified control is not found.

exception.span: \- or - The specified control does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

span.span: \- or - The specified control does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

summary.span: Determines whether the control specified by the property is a valid control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法主要是供屬性來判斷是否屬性包含有效的輸入的控制項。The method is a helper method used primarily by the property to determine whether the property contains a valid input control. 若要是有效的輸入的控制項屬性必須設為某個值，該值必須是支援驗證頁面上的控制項。To be a valid input control, the property must be set to some value and that value must be a control on the page that supports validation. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: No value is specified for the property.

span.span: No value is specified for the property.

exception.span: \- or - The input control specified by the property is not found on the page.

span.span: \- or - The input control specified by the property is not found on the page.

exception.span: \- or - The input control specified by the property does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

span.span: \- or - The input control specified by the property does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

summary.span: Gets or sets the input control to validate.

value.span: 要驗證的輸入的控制項。

value.span: 預設值是，表示這個屬性未設定。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要驗證的輸入的控制項。Use the property to specify the input control to validate. 這個屬性必須設定為以外的所有驗證控制項的輸入控制項的 ID控制項，可以保留空白。This property must be set to the ID of an input control for all validation controls except the control, which can be left blank. 如果您未指定有效的輸入的控制項，在呈現的頁面時將會擲回例外狀況。If you do not specify a valid input control, an exception will be thrown when the page is rendered. 識別碼必須參考相同的容器做為驗證控制項中的控制項。The ID must refer to a control within the same container as the validation control. 它必須位於相同的頁面或使用者控制項，或它必須位於相同的樣板化控制項範本。It must be in the same page or user control, or it must be in the same template of a templated control. 可驗證的標準控制項有：The standard controls that can be validated are: - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 輸入要驗證控制項的屬性必須套用至控制項。For an input control to be validated, the attribute must be applied to the control. 所有驗證控制項，除了控制項，將會通過驗證，如果所指定的輸入的控制項屬性不包含文字。All validation controls, except the control, will pass validation if the input control specified by the property contains no text. 如果您使用控制、 用戶端和伺服器端驗證函式不會呼叫其中。If you are using a control, the client-side and server-side validation functions are not called either. 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要驗證的輸入的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the input control to validate. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 函式，主要供屬性來判斷用戶端瀏覽器是否支援用戶端指令碼。The method is a helper function that is used primarily by the property to determine whether the client's browser supports client script. 這個屬性來傳回`true`，下列條件必須成立：For this property to return `true`, the following conditions must be true: - 瀏覽器已啟用的用戶端指令碼。The browser has client script enabled. - 屬性物件儲存在屬性是 1 或更新版本。The property of the object that is stored in the property is 1 or later. - 屬性物件儲存在屬性是 1.2 或更新版本。The property of the object that is stored in the property is 1.2 or later. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來驗證控制項中指定的錯誤訊息的顯示行為。Use the property to specify the display behavior of the error message in the validation control. 下表列出可用的不同值。The following table lists the different values that can be used. |顯示行為Display behavior|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`None`|驗證訊息永遠不會內嵌顯示。The validation message is never displayed inline.| |`Static`|頁面配置中配置的驗證訊息的空間。Space for the validation message is allocated in the page layout.| |`Dynamic`|如果驗證失敗，驗證訊息的空間以動態方式會加入至頁面。Space for the validation message is dynamically added to the page if validation fails.| > [!NOTE] > 顯示行為取決於是否執行用戶端驗證。The display behavior depends on whether client-side validation is performed. 如果用戶端驗證不在作用中 (因為瀏覽器不支援或已停用使用頁面指示詞或屬性)，`ValidatorDisplay.Static`和`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`以相同方式運作： 錯誤訊息會總空間才會顯示。If client-side validation is not active (because the browser does not support it or because it has been disabled by using the page directive or property), `ValidatorDisplay.Static` and `ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic` behave the same way: the error message takes up space only if it is displayed. 能夠動態配置空間的訊息時沒有被顯示 (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) 只適用於用戶端驗證。The ability to dynamically allocate space for the message when it is not being displayed (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) only works with client-side validation. 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以驗證訊息都會加入至網頁以動態方式驗證失敗時，指定該空間。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that space for the validation message is added to the Web page dynamically when validation fails. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is enabled.

value.span: 如果已啟用用戶端驗證。否則， 。

span.span: if client-side validation is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否已啟用用戶端驗證。Use the property to specify whether client-side validation is enabled. 驗證控制項一律會在伺服器上執行驗證。Validation controls always perform validation on the server. 他們也擁有完整的用戶端實作可讓 DHTML 支援瀏覽器 （例如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本） 用戶端上執行驗證。They also have complete client-side implementation that allows DHTML-supported browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 用戶端驗證，以增強驗證程序傳送到伺服器之前，請檢查使用者輸入。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 這可讓之前提交表單時，避免的伺服器端驗證所需的資訊，來回行程期間偵測到用戶端上的錯誤。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 根據預設，這個值設為`true`，可讓用戶端驗證，如果瀏覽器支援它。By default, this value is set to `true`, which enables client-side validation if the browser supports it. 您可以停用控制項的控制項為基礎的用戶端驗證。You can disable client-side validation on a control-by-control basis. 如果用戶端上的動態更新會產生問題的頁面配置，或如果您想要進行驗證之前，執行某些伺服器程式碼，這非常有用。This is useful if dynamic updating on the client creates problems with the layout of the page, or if you want to execute some server code before validation takes place. 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性停用用戶端驗證，以便可以在伺服器上產生隨機數字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to disable client-side validation so that the random numbers can be generated on the server. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation control is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation control is enabled.

value.span: 如果已啟用驗證控制項。否則， 。

span.span: if the validation control is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否啟用驗證控制項。Use the property to specify whether the validation control is enabled. 可以將此屬性設定為停用驗證控制項`false`。You can disable the validation control by setting this property to `false`. 設定或屬性`false`會防止執行驗證。Setting either the or the property to `false` will prevent validation from being performed. 這會導致屬性一律評估為`true`。This causes the property to always evaluate to `true`. 屬性會稍有不同屬性。The property is slightly different from the property. 如果驗證控制項的屬性設定為`true`，但屬性設定為`false`，驗證控制項仍轉譯用戶端驗證，但停用狀態。If the property for a validation control is set to `true`, but the property is set to `false`, the validation control is still rendered for client-side validation, but in a disabled state. 您可以再重新啟用用戶端上的驗證控制項使用 DHTML 指令碼。You can then re-enable the validation control on the client by using DHTML script. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用啟用或停用在網頁上使用伺服器端程式碼驗證控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable or disable the validation controls on the Web page using server-side code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用啟用或停用在網頁上使用用戶端程式碼驗證控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable or disable the validation controls on the Web page using client-side code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用控制，請使用屬性來指定要顯示在文字控制當驗證失敗時的目前驗證控制項。When using a control, use the property to specify the text to display in the control when validation fails for the current validation control. 若要指定要在驗證控制項本身所顯示的文字，請使用屬性。To specify the text to display in the validation control itself, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定屬性未設定屬性、 值屬性也會顯示在驗證控制項。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定不同的訊息控制項和和控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify different messages for the control and the and controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定驗證失敗時，驗證控制項中顯示的訊息的自訂文字色彩。Use the property to specify a custom text color for the message displayed in the validation control when validation fails. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以藍色顯示驗證訊息。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the validation message in blue. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the associated input control passes validation.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the associated input control passes validation.

value.span: 如果相關聯輸入的控制項通過驗證。否則， 。

span.span: if the associated input control passes validation; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以判斷相關聯輸入的控制項是否通過驗證。Use the property to determine whether the associated input control passes validation. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這個屬性的預設值是`true`，它會傳回`true`如果執行驗證之前，查詢此屬性。Because the default value of this property is `true`, it will return `true` if you query this property before validation is performed. 比方說，這可能是如果您嘗試使用這個屬性在頁面的事件。For example, this might occur if you attempt to use this property in the event of a page. 屬性進行評估時，才方法呼叫。The property is evaluated only when the method is called. 您可以呼叫方法來驗證每個頁面上個別控制項或使用一次呼叫它們全部方法。You can call the method for each validation control on the page individually, or call all of them at once by using the method. 按鈕控制項使用其`CausesValidation`屬性設定為`true`也會呼叫方法。Button controls with their `CausesValidation` property set to `true` will also call the method. > [!NOTE] > 很可能在驗證後隨同手動變更這個屬性的值。It is possible to change the value of this property manually after validation has taken place. 這可讓您覆寫驗證結果，如有必要。This allows you to override the validation result, if necessary. 頁面屬性設定為`true`才頁面上的每個驗證控制項的屬性也會設為`true`。The property for the page is set to `true` only if the property for each validation control on the page is also set to `true`. 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以判斷相關聯輸入的控制項是否通過驗證。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the associated input control passes validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseValidatorIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseValidatorIsValid/CS/basevalidatorisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseValidatorIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseValidatorIsValid/VB/basevalidatorisvalidvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫基底控制項之後方法，它會設定屬性如果下列條件成立：After this method calls the base control's method, it sets the property to if the following conditions are true: - 未設定屬性。The property is not already set. - 屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本早於`4.0`。The property indicates an ASP.NET version earlier than `4.0`. 根據預設，ASP.NET 4 和更新版本中的驗證程式控制項不會顯示錯誤以紅色。By default, validator controls in ASP.NET 4 and later versions do not display errors in red. 如何控制驗證程式控制項的視覺外觀的相關資訊，請參閱[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For information about how to control the visual appearance of validator controls, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 這個方法也會註冊頁面上的驗證控制項。This method also registers the validation control on the page.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已覆寫這個方法來檢查用戶端瀏覽器並設定驗證控制項的呈現之前的相容性。This method has been overridden to check the client browser and configure the validation control for compatibility prior to rendering. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已取消註冊頁面上的驗證控制項覆寫這個方法。This method has been overridden to unregister the validation control on the page. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷用戶端瀏覽器是否支援"新版"呈現。Use the property to determine whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering. 支援 「 新版"轉譯的瀏覽器，它必須支援 4 或更新版本的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 文件物件模型 (DOM) 版本和 ECMAScript 版本 1.2 或更新版本。For a browser to support "uplevel" rendering, it must support Microsoft Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM) version 4 or later and ECMAScript version 1.2 or later. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。This property is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus is set to the control specified by the property when validation fails.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus is set to the control specified by the property when validation fails.

value.span: 要設定所指定的控制項焦點當驗證失敗時; 否則。

span.span: to set focus on the control specified by when validation fails; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否焦點會自動設為所指定的控制項屬性，這個驗證控制項失敗時。Use the property to specify whether focus is automatically set to the control specified by the property when this validation control fails. 這可讓使用者快速更新適當的控制項。This allows the user to quickly update the appropriate control. 如果多個驗證控制項失敗，此屬性設定為`true`，在指定的控制項屬性的第一個驗證控制項接收焦點。If multiple validation controls fail and this property is set to `true`, the control specified in the property for the first validation control receives focus. 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要驗證失敗時，驗證控制項中顯示的文字。Use the property to specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails. 您也可以顯示在頁面中的驗證失敗所使用的所有控制項的摘要控制項。You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a control. 若要指定要顯示在文字控制，請使用屬性。To specify the text to display in a control, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定屬性未設定屬性、 值屬性也會顯示在驗證控制項。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法相關聯輸入控制項上執行驗證。Use the method to perform validation on the associated input control. 這個方法可讓您以程式設計的方式輸入控制項上執行驗證。This method allows you to programmatically perform validation on the input control. 屬性就會自動更新與驗證結果。The property is automatically updated with the validation results. ## Examples 如需方法用在衍生類別中，請參閱類別概觀。For an example of the method used in a derived class, see the class overview.

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.

value.span: 這個驗證控制項所屬的驗證群組名稱。

span.span: The name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供許多控制項已張貼至伺服器的能力。ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server. 當其中一種控制項具有其`CausesValidation`屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時執行驗證。When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to server. 下列控制項有能力回傳至伺服器：The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 其中某些控制項回傳至伺服器時，才`AutoPostBack`屬性設定為`true`。Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`. 這些控制項都具有`ValidationGroup`屬性，設定時，控制觸發程序回傳至伺服器時，驗證只驗證控制項內指定的群組。These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server. 使用驗證群組指派驗證控制項的屬性。Use the property to assign a validation control to a validation group. 類別也會公開方法和方法接受輸入的參數。The class also exposes a method and a method that accept a input parameter. 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來驗證控制項指派給群組。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a validation control to a group. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseValidatorValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseValidatorValidationGroup/CS/BaseValidatorValidationGroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseValidatorValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseValidatorValidationGroup/VB/BaseValidatorValidationGroupvb.aspx#1)]
